      • tokenizeSearchQuery

        public static java.lang.String[][] tokenizeSearchQuery(java.lang.String query,
                                                       int tab)
        Parameters:

        tab - - search in tab (0 - Student/1 - Professor/2 -Subject)
        Returns:
        - String Matrix - first row are column names, second are requested values for corresponding column (by name)
